articles.title: S. Korean Regime Urged to Send back Abductees of DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Urged to Send back Abductees of DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Sunday released a statement hitting out at the Park Geun Hye group of traitors for becoming all the more undisguised in their confrontation and conspiratorial racket.
					 The Park Geun Hye group recently committed a hideous abduction against the DPRK. It lured into other country in the most despicable and brutal manner DPRK's employees of a restaurant in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province of China in collusion with brokers active there, before abducting them into south Korea. 
					
					 The statement branded this as an inhuman act that can be committed only by such fascist tyrant as Park Geun Hye and the group of ferocious terrorists and gangsters such as the puppet Intelligence Service.
					
					 However, the Park group is working hard to mislead public opinion by describing the case as "a group defection from the north" and "substantial effect of sanctions" and "skepticism about north's social system", "reflection of yearning" for the south Korean society.
					
					 As for those abductees, they are talents who grew up in happiness while learning to their heart's content under the care of the DPRK.
					
					 There can be no socio-political and economic reason for them to be "skeptical" about the social system and about their beloved parents and family members as they have enjoyed a highly stable life under the social system in the DPRK.
					
					 Moreover, they are the women with pure conscience as they have never imagined that they would be taken to such horrible hell as south Korea.
					
					 The abduction of the citizens of the DPRK is an extension and vivid manifestation of the hideous "north policy" of Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The CPRK clarifies its crucial stand as follows under the prevailing gruesome situation:
					
					 1. Park Geun Hye and her group must apologize for the unprecedented group abduction and immediately and unconditionally send them back.
					
					 If Park and her group keep them in custody and persecute them in a bid to press them into defection and cause harm to their physical condition even a bit, the Park group will be made to pay dearly for the crime.
					
					 2. The Park Geun Hye group must sternly punish those involved in the allurement and abduction and backstage wire-pullers or hand them over to the law enforcement organ of the DPRK side and make assurances against the recurrence of similar crimes to the DPRK and the international community.
					
					 In case those involved in the allurement and abduction and back-stage wire-pullers are neither handed over to the DPRK side nor punished, and no assurances are given against the recurrence of similar crimes, the DPRK will consider the recent case was committed at the direct instruction of Chongwadae and it is an expression of the intention to keep abducting DPRK citizens in the future, too, and will take thousand-fold retaliatory measures targeting Chongwadae.
					
					 3. The Park Geun Hye group must clearly understand the will of the army and people of the DPRK to annihilate the enemies and must stop running riot.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain an on-looker to our citizens falling victim to political conspiracy after being abducted in group in broad daylight and taken to such a veritable hell as south Korea.
					
					 The infuriated army and people of the DPRK are closely following every movement of the puppet group.
					
					 We will never tolerate the recent terrorist gangster-like act but will certainly force the criminals to pay a dear price.
					
					 In case the Park group of traitors keeps DPRK citizens in custody, defying the just demand of the DPRK, the group will have to pay an unimaginably high price.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Delegation of Kyrgyz Party
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Delegation of Kyrgyz Party
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, had a talk with a delegation of the political party "Aalam-party of non-parties" of Kyrgyzstan headed by Arslanbek Maliev, leader of the party, which paid a courtesy call on him Sunday.

articles.title: 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Closes
articles.content:
30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival which opened on April 11 closed with due ceremony at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Sunday.
					 The festival was a grand international art gathering of progressives reflecting their ardent yearning for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their faith and will to deeply trust and follow Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants in the festival significantly celebrated the birth anniversary of the President by presenting colorful pieces prepared with sincerity and made a contribution to developing culture and art of mankind.
					
					 The performances of the festival were enjoyed by a lot of people, school youth and children, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here, military attaches and staff members of foreign embassies here and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, officials concerned, citizens, foreign artistes, overseas Korean artistes, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies, military attaches and staff members of foreign embassies here and other foreign guests.
					
					 Group prize was awarded to the State Academic Voronezh Russian Folk Choir, the State Cossacks Dance Company "Stavropolye" of Russia, the Flamenco Band of Spain, the art troupe of Koreans in Japan and the art troupe of Koreans in China and prize of merits, prize of creation, individual prize and prize of ensemble went to many artistes and works.
					
					 Gold cups corresponding to the festival prizes, gold and silver prizes and diplomas were awarded to them. 
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un to be presented by the participants in the festival was adopted.
					
					 Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture and chairman of the festival organizing committee, made a closing address.
					
					 At the end of the closing ceremony performances were given by foreign artistes who deeply impressed the audience during the festival.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Art Festival
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival Sunday.
					 The letter said the festival made a great contribution to boosting the bonds among people and artistes of various countries of the world and thus demonstrating again with pride its good tradition, noble idea and great vitality.
					
					 During the days of the festival, we joined the Korean people in significantly celebrating the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, and were admired to witness for ourselves the their heroic struggle, it noted, and continued:
					
					 We are pleased that the festival was successfully held thanks to the sincere efforts of the Korean people and the festival organizing committee.
					
					 The letter extended thanks to Kim Jong Un for having taken meticulous care of the participants of the festival so that it was held with splendor though very busy leading the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il will always be remembered by the progressives of the world and the festival will steadily develop into a grand international art festival thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the letter concluded.

articles.title: Joint Friendship Gathering with Participants in Art Festival Held
articles.content:
Joint Friendship Gathering with Participants in Art Festival Held
Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A joint friendship gathering with the participants in the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival was held at the Central Youth Hall on Sunday.
					 Present there were members of the festival organizing committee, officials concerned, foreign artistes and overseas Korean artistes.
					
					 The participants talked to one another that they splendidly celebrated the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) as an international art festival and underscored the need to develop friendship and solidarity and boost exchanges and cooperation among countries and nations.
					
					 They sang and danced, deepening the friendship.

articles.title: Delegation of Kyrgyz Party Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Kyrgyz Party Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Political Party "Aalam-Party of Non-Parties" of Kyrgyzstan headed by Arslanbek Maliev, leader of the party, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests laid a bouquet at the old home of Mangyongdae.
					
					 They looked round historic relics with deep attention, being briefed on the sacred revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Monument to Party Founding, the venue of the 18th Kimilsungia Festival, the Sci-Tech Complex, the Okryu Children's Hospital and other places.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Leadership of Political Party "Aalam-Party of Non-Parties" of Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Leadership of Political Party "Aalam-Party of Non-Parties" of Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Leadership of the Political Party "Aalam-Party of Non-Parties" of Kyrgyzstan.
					 Arslanbek Maliev who is heading a delegation of the party on a visit to the DPRK handed the gift over to Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, on Sunday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Moscow City Committee of Communist Party of Russian Federation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Moscow City Committee of Communist Party of Russian Federation 
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Moscow City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Sunday by Nikolay Zubrilin, member of the Bureau of the Moscow City Committee and deputy to the Moscow City Duma who is heading a delegation of the Moscow City Committee on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Sojourn of Participants of Art Festival
articles.content:
Sojourn of Participants of Art Festival
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Participants in the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival visited the venue of the 18th Kimilsungia Festival.
					 They looked round the venue of the festival decorated with immortal flowers.
					
					 They also went to the Rungna Dolphinarium.
					
					 They toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Sci-Tech Complex and other places.

articles.title: State Cossacks Dance Company "Stavropolye"
articles.content:
State Cossacks Dance Company "Stavropolye"
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Among foreign art troupes attending the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival is the State Cossacks Dance Company "Stavropolye" of Russia. 
					 The dance company is the one of high repute which has given 200 performances in different countries every year and was awarded top prizes and certificates in various international art festivals.
					
					 In this art festival, the company put on the stage immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and Korean famous song "Don't Advance, Night of Pyongyang" in chorus. 
					
					 And its passionate and vivacious Cossack songs and dances were highly acclaimed by audience.

articles.title: Institute of International Political Studies of DPRK Discloses Truth about Anti-DPRK Fabrication Made by U.S. and Its Followers
articles.content:
Institute of International Political Studies of DPRK Discloses Truth about Anti-DPRK Fabrication Made by U.S. and Its Followers
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Institute of International Political Studies of the DPRK Sunday issued a statement probing the truth behind the anti-DPRK slanders and sophism made by the U.S. and its followers.
					 It said:
					
					 The U.S. and its followers' steady trumpeting about "provocation" and "threat" from the north is no more than shameless and brigandish sophism to make profound confusion of right and wrong.
					
					 Their sinister purpose is to isolate and destroy the DPRK on the earth even by rallying the motley crowds as they are afraid of the DPRK which is bolstering up its strength.
					
					 "Violation of international law and UN resolution" which the U.S. and hostile forces so persistently cite when pulling up the DPRK is no more than false charges of those who do not know about the foundation and essence of the international political order.
					
					 This is an expression of cross temper and undisguised blackmail against the DPRK which neither kowtows to their high-handed and arbitrary practices nor follows the order of jungle law centered on the U.S.
					
					 The most abnormal and rogue state in the world is the U.S. and its followers as they work hard to turn the earth into the place ruled by jungle law in defiance of international law and conventions on equality for all and international peace.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are making it a fait accompli and spreading the story of the "instability of the social system of the DPRK at various meetings. This is nothing but senseless rhetoric of those who daydream themselves as they have anxiously waited for the "collapse of social system of the DPRK" for decades.
					
					 As recognized by public at home and abroad, the DPRK has never suffered any slightest political vacillation, social instability, chaos and disturbance despite a number of harsh ordeals and difficulties worse than those during a war.
					
					 But under the rotten capitalist political system, society is shaking to the very foundation owing to the continuous big and small anti-government actions and public resistances as well as chaos and crises beyond control.
					
					 The invectives of the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group against the DPRK's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force are the last shriek of those frightened by the eye-opening development of the DPRK and its upcoming final victory.
					
					 They are free to talk about the DPRK.
					
					 However, what we would like to advise is that they had better talk about things they saw for themselves.
					
					 Pyongyang always keeps its door wide open even for those who did hurt the DPRK in the past in a customary and blinded way.
					
					 But if they continue to slander the inviolable and pure idea and social system in the DPRK and resort to hostile propaganda toward it by mobilizing international bodies and venal media to attain their most despicable purpose in spite of our tolerance and patience, the service personnel and people of the DPRK will never pardon them but force them whoever they may be to pay dearly.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. and S. Korean Authorities of Their Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Confab
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. and S. Korean Authorities of Their Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Confab
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the "envoy for human rights issue in north Korea" of the U.S. Department of State visited south Korea under the pretext of discussing the "proposal on improving the human rights in the north". The American master and south Korean stooges were reported to have discussed for five days follow-up steps for enforcing the "Law on Human Rights in the North" fabricated in south Korea in March and the UN Human Rights Council's "resolution on human rights in the north." 
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says:
					
					 It is ridiculous of these foolish guys to talk about accusing and punishing somebody though they do not know when they will face merciless retaliatory blows of the Songun armed forces. 
					
					 The above-said human rights huddles are nothing but charades to bar the DPRK from dashing ahead like the wind along the road of invincible Songun.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime has turned south Korea into a graveyard of democracy by suppressing and persecuting all those asserting justice and truth and calling for national concord and reunification after labeling them "followers of the north" and "enemy-benefiting forces."  Moreover, it brutally cracked down bereaved families calling for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol sinking tragedy, not content with leaving hundreds of children buried at the bottom of the sea. Is there anyone who will pay heed to such burlesque staged in the tundra of human rights?
					
					 What is urgently required in this world is to put the early possible end to the shuddering human rights abuses in south Korea, the world's worst tundra of human rights where the dignity and rights of human beings are mercilessly violated and stamped out under the revived "yusin" fascist dictatorship and the evermore escalating anti-DPRK "human rights" racket of the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors.

articles.title: Minju Joson Ridicules Park Geun Hye's Bombast
articles.content:
Minju Joson Ridicules Park Geun Hye's Bombast
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye said at the "state council meeting" in Chongwadae on April 12 that "the north is persisting in reckless provocations and its purpose is to create discord in the south, divide the public opinion and foil cooperation of the international community." She cried out for "decisive counteraction," talking about "strength of people."
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What Park uttered is nothing but the last-ditch effort of an old witch to get out of the abyss of ruin.
					
					 Her cry out for countering the north with talk about "strength of people" is nothing but bluffing and temerity.
					
					 Now the Park group of traitors is in the grip of the serious ruling crisis, hit hard from all sides. The south Korean people have turned their backs on the Chongwadae, fed up with Park's sycophancy towards the U.S., confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and unpopular rule.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric she may spout, she will meet a miserable end before long like her father did.

articles.title: S. Korean People's Mindset Punishes Park Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean People's Mindset Punishes Park Regime
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on April 14 carried an editorial titled "Mindset Punishes President Park Geun Hye".
					 The mindset in the general election is, in a word, the punishment of the present regime, the editorial said.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" failed to acquire majority seats, a clear expression of the people's stern punishment of Park Geun Hye and repugnance and disappointment at her, it noted.
					
					 Park styling herself "queen of election" was hit hard by the mindset, it said, adding:
					
					 She should listen to the people's voices and set right the orbit of state affairs.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Urge Park Geun Hye, "Saenuri Party" to Comply with Public Mindset
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Urge Park Geun Hye, "Saenuri Party" to Comply with Public Mindset
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on April 14 in an editorial said that the "Saenuri Party" suffered a heavy defeat in the "National Assembly" election, the people's stern punishment of Park Geun Hye and the ruling party.
					 The election results amount to the people's strong criticism of arrogance and self-opinion of the Park regime, it noted.
					
					 It accused Park of behaving like a judge, far from being responsible for the errors and incompetence of the regime.
					
					 The election outcome reflects the will of the people not to tolerate the incompetence and self-opinion of the "president" any longer, it said, demanding Park and the "Saenuri Party" comply with the public mindset.

articles.title: Members of S. Korean Body and Religionists Honor Memory of Victims of Sexual Slavery and Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
Members of S. Korean Body and Religionists Honor Memory of Victims of Sexual Slavery and Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting in memory of the victims of the ferry Sewol disaster and sexual slavery before the statue of a girl sexual slave for the Imperial Japanese Army in Taejon on April 13, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 Present at the meeting were members of the "Peace Butterfly Taejon Action" and religionists of the Round Buddhist Parish in Taejon and South Chungchong Province.
					
					 Speakers there said victims of sexual slavery undergo bitterer sufferings owing to the Japanese government's irresponsible and insincere attitude and humiliating act of the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 They also said victims of the ferry Sewol disaster met grievous deaths even though they could be rescued.
					
					 They denounced the Park regime for trying to cover up the truth even after the lapse of two years since the disaster, while ignoring the efforts of the bereaved families and civic organizations.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Hold Anti-"Government" Struggle
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Hold Anti-"Government" Struggle
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Students throughout south Korea staged an action in Seoul on April 16, two years since the ferry Sewol disaster, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 The Students Preparatory Committee for Probing the Truth behind the April 16 Ferry Sewol Disaster held a meeting together with 78 organizations including the April 16 Solidarity.
					
					 Speakers said that the students would directly probe the truth behind the disaster to the end.
					
					 They strongly denounced the regime and the ruling party for obstructing the probe into the truth.
					
					 The participants staged a demo.
					
					 They participated in an all-people candlelight rally.
					
					 Meanwhile, university freshmen made public a declaration before the Seoul Sejong Cultural Center that day demanding the probe into the truth behind the disaster.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held celebrations at Yuwen Middle School in Jilin, China on April 15, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The participants laid floral baskets before the statue of Kim Il Sung at the school and paid tribute to him.
					
					 A meeting of the association took place.
					
					 Choe Su Bong, vice-chairman of the association, in a report said that the world has never known such prominent leader and great revolutionary as Generalissimo Kim Il Sung who glorified a century as one of the victory of the anti-imperialist independent cause, the socialist cause and the cause of human independence, enjoying the absolute support and trust of the popular masses for his original idea, outstanding leadership and noble virtues.
					
					 He called for positively turning out in the patriotic work for reunification to add brilliance to the country while keeping pace with the people of the motherland.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Then followed the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia exhibition, photo and book exhibition and art performance.
					
					 Meanwhile, there took place celebrations including meetings for adopting a letter to Kim Jong Un and film shows at the Yanbian Regional Association, the Liaoning Regional Association and the Zhongnan Regional Association under the general association on April 10 and 13.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on April 15, the Day of the Sun.
					 April 15, the birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, is the day of great fortune for the nation when the sun of Juche rose up for the first time in the nation's 5 000 year-long history and the day of great event when the dawn of the era of independence was broken for the progressives, the letter said, and went on:
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Il Sung is the father of socialist Korea and peerlessly elder statesman. It is the greatest honor and pride of the Korean nation and happiness of all the generations to come to uphold him as the eternal leader.
					
					 His immortal revolutionary history could be steadily carried forward thanks to the wise guidance of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who put forward the accomplishment of the cause of Juche revolution as his lifelong mission.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un who inherited the cause of the great Generalissimos is making a great contribution to the cause of socialism and the cause of human independence.
					
					 We, as befitting Koreans in China living in the battle-sites of the anti-Japanese revolution where precious revolutionary tradition of the country of Juche was established, will preserve and manage the revolutionary battle-sites and historical sites with care and give wide publicity to them and actively educate compatriots through them to make the undying revolutionary exploits of the great leaders shine long.
					
					 The letter expressed the will to strengthen the General Association of Koreans in China, patriotic legacy of the great leaders, into the overseas compatriots organization trusting and following Kim Jong Un only and turn out as one in the work for prosperity of the motherland and the patriotic movement for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was brought out in pamphlet by the Chita City Publishing House of the Zabaikal Territory, Russia on April 6 on the occasions of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013) deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and clarifies the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of Songun revolution.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Kyrgyzstan, India, Uganda
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held in Kyrgyzstan, India, Uganda
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of President Kim Il Sung were held by the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party, the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il and the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement on April 6 and 8 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of the President (the Day of the Sun).
					 On display at the venues of the seminars were photos dealing with the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were photos and publications introducing the DPRK.
					
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party who doubles as chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Kyrgyzstan, said that the President brought about the brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists' invasion and defended the country's sovereignty.
					
					 He noted that the President turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, lauded the President as the benevolent father who devoted his whole life to the people.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement and other speakers praised the President for making a great contribution to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated by Nordic Political Parties, Organizations
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated by Nordic Political Parties, Organizations
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting of Nordic political parties and organizations was held in Stockholm on April 9 in celebration of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Displayed at the meeting place were photos dealing with the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Their works, and books introducing their exploits were also on display.
					
					 Present at the meeting were figures of political parties and organizations, members of the Juche idea study organizations and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in Sweden, Finland, Norway and other Nordic countries, and the DPRK ambassador to Sweden and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets and flowers before the art piece depicting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made by Eric Andersson, executive member of the Communist Party in Sweden, Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, and others. 
					
					 The speakers said the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung, the eternal leader and great teacher of not only the Korean people but progressive mankind, will go down in history.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Also a statement was adopted.

articles.title: Korean Photo, Book and Art Exhibitions Open in Peru, Russia, Bulgaria
articles.content:
Korean Photo, Book and Art Exhibitions Open in Peru, Russia, Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Korean photo, book and art exhibitions opened with due ceremonies in Lima of Peru, Irkutsk of Russia and Sofia of Bulgaria on April 6 and 8 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos showing the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, books and photos introducing the DPRK and art pieces associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union praised Kim Il Sung as the great leader and great statesman, adding that it was a great honor of the Peruvian people to hold the Korean exhibition on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 A deputy governor of Irkutsk Region, Russia said:
					
					 The exhibition will help introduce the time-honored history of Korea, the reality of the DPRK, distinguished wisdom and talents of the Korean people and prominent national characteristics.
					
					 Friendship between the peoples of Russia and the DPRK is being boosted through cultural exchange and cooperation.
					
					 The president of the Central Council of the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union said that the exhibition will offer the Bulgarian people an opportunity of knowing about the recent successes in the DPRK. The Korean people would as ever dynamically advance toward the final victory along the road of their choice, he added.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Korean Friendship Association
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Korean Friendship Association
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain opened its new website "Great exploits-to praise peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu" on April 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Posted on the website were photos documenting the revolutionary career and external activities of the President and articles titled "Kim Il Sung, eternal sun", "Kim Il Sung, great man of century", "Mangyongdae" and "Sunny smile".
					
					 The articles praised the President as the great leader who founded the Juche idea indicating the way of mankind and made tremendous contribution to the cause of global independence and a peerless sage who attracted all people with his noble personality and virtues.
					
					 The cause of independence, Songun and socialism pioneered by the President is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the articles noted, adding that the President will always be alive as the sun together with the daily-developing DPRK under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Venezuelan Bodies Extend Invariable Support to DPRK
articles.content:
Venezuelan Bodies Extend Invariable Support to DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Venezuela-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association on April 9 made public a joint statement in support of the statement of a spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The U.S. gets more vicious in its moves to stifle the DPRK by slapping harsh "sanctions" against the DPRK, the joint statement said, and went on:
					
					 The blockade against Leningrad which struck terror into the hearts of people as a pronoun of the harshest sanctions in the world history of wars and the Caribbean crisis in the Cold War era can hardly stand comparison with the situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula at present.
					
					 It is ridiculous that the U.S. does not know till now that its persistent hostile policy towards the DPRK for over a century since the start of its stand-off with the latter is an anachronistic and suicidal act of precipitating its self-destruction.
					
					 Those, who blindly yielded to the brigandish demands of the U.S. which lorded it over our planet through high-handed and arbitrary practices, domination and hegemony and joined it in its hostile moves against the DPRK through "UN resolution" should know that nothing can compensate for what they made a mess of the past precious legacy and tradition.
					
					 We extend invariable support and solidarity to the DPRK dynamically advancing along the road of its choice, not yielding to anyone.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on April 14 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present there on invitation were figures of the Russian State Duma, the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, "A Just Russia", the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks, the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of Education and Science, the Ministry of Culture, the Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Russia, the Russian Railways Company, the Russian Academy of Sciences and the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were the DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy officials.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before an art work depicting the President and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and paid homage to them.
					
					 They looked round the photos dealing with exploits of the President, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Arefiyev, vice-chairman of the Economic Policy Committee of the Russian State Duma, said at the reception:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung is the father of socialist Korea.
					
					 He is the great leader who devoted his life to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 And he provided the origin of the traditional Russia-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations.
					
					 We see eye-opening events taking place in the DPRK.
					
					 The reality proves that the DPRK has a good prospect for its development.
					
					 The Russia-DPRK friendly relations will continue boosting.

articles.title: Kyrgyz Party Signs Pyongyang Declaration
articles.content:
Kyrgyz Party Signs Pyongyang Declaration
 Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- The Political Party "Aalam-Party of Non-Parties" of Kyrgyzstan signed the Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism" on April 15.
					 Leader of the party Arslanbek Maliev who is heading a delegation of the party on a visit to the DPRK signed the declaration on behalf of the party. He said that he deemed it honor to visit the DPRK and sign the Pyongyang Declaration, adding he will invariably support the cause of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: CRPP demanda a banda de Park Geun-hye devolver a los secuestrados de RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP demanda a banda de Park Geun-hye devolver a los secuestrados de RPDC
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que se torna cada dia mas siniestra la campana intrigante de la banda de traidores surcoreanos de Park Geun-hye contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de Corea (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 17 una declaracion.
					Segun el documento, en complicidad con los intermediarios chinos, la camarilla de Park Geun-hye rapto de manera mas grosera y barbara a los empleados de la RPDC que gestionaban un restaurante en Ningbo de la provincia china de Zhejiang y  les llevo al sur de Corea. 
					
					Es un crimen de lesa humanidad que puede cometer solo la tirania fascista como Park Geun-hye y el grupo de gangsteres terroristas como el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Sin embargo, la banda de Park induce en error la opinion publica calificando el presente incidente de "fuga colectiva", "eficiencia sustancial de la sancion", "incertidumbre sobre el regimen norcoreano" y "expresion de simpatia" por la  sociedad surcoreana.
					
					En cuanto a los secuestrados, todos son talentosos que han crecido felizmente en el regazo de la RPDC estudiando sin envidiar nada en el mundo. 
					
					Para ellos que disfrutaron de una vida estable en la sociedad socialista graciosa no hay ninguna razon sociopolitica ni economica de tener algun "incertidumbre" sobre el regimen de la RPDC y sus queridos padres. 
					
					En particular, las mujeres secuestradas no imaginaron nunca que podrian ir a la sociedad surcoreana tan horrible. 
					
					El secuestro a los ciudadanos de la RPDC es la continuacion y expresion concentrada de la brutal "politica sobre el Norte" de Park Geun-hye. 
					
					Con respecto a la situacion grave, el Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria aclara la siguiente posicion importante:
					
					1. Park y su banda deben pedir disculpas por el presente crimen de tentacion y secuestro colectivo de gran tamano sin precedentes y devolver de inmediato e incondicionalmente a nuestros ciudadanos.
					
					Si les imponen la sumision o perjudican aun en lo minimo sus cuerpos recluyendoles y acosandoles de  continuo, el crimen se calculara mas gravemente.
					
					2. Ellos deben dar el castigo severo a los involucrados en la presente seduccion y secuestro y a los controladores traseros o entregar a nuestros organos judiciales y prometer firmemente ante nosotros y la sociedad internacional que no volveran a cometer el acto de tentacion y rapto.
					
					Si no aceptan nuestra demanda, tomaremos las medidas de represalia de mil veces fuertes contra Chongwadae considerandolo como incidente ocurrido por la orden directa de Chongwadae e intencion de seguir recurriendo a la seduccion y secuestro en futuro tambien.
					
					3. La banda de Park Geun-hye no debe actuar temerariamente conociendo correctamente la voluntad de aniquilar a los enemigos de nuestros militares y civiles indignados.
					
					  La RPDC nunca estara con los brazos cruzados ante el hecho de que sus ciudadanos secuestrados a plena luz del dia y en colectivo y arrastrados al infierno humano como el Sur de Corea sean victimas del complot politico.
					
					  Ahora todos los movimientos de la pandilla titere estan al alcance de la vista de nuestros militares y civiles indignados.
					
					  Nunca toleraremos el acto terrorista y cobraremos sin falta el precio.
					
					  Si niega nuestra demanda justa y sigue reteniendo a nuestros ciudadanos, la horda traidora de Park Geun-hye pagara el precio inimaginablemente tragico.

articles.title: Clausurado XXX Festival Artistico de Amistad en Primavera
articles.content:
Clausurado XXX Festival Artistico de Amistad en Primavera
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurado el XXX Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera, iniciado el pasado dia 11 en esta capital.
					En este festival internacional se han manifestado la gran anoranza de la humanidad progresista del mundo al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la firme conviccion de confiar y apoyar al Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Al ofrecer diversos programas artisticos preparados con sinceridad, los participantes en la cita artistica celebraron significativamente el Dia del Sol y contribuyeron a desarrollar mas la cultura y arte de la humanidad. 
					
					En el periodo del certamen, vieron las funciones muchos trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares del pais, los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, agregados militares y miembros de las embajadas de varios paises, acreditados en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, otros huespedes extranjeros y compatriotas residentes en ultramar. 
					
					La ceremonia de clausura tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este con la participacion del vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop y otros funcionarios correspondientes, trabajadores capitalinos, artistas extranjeros y compatriotas, representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales, agregados militares y miembros de las embajadas de varios paises, acreditados en la RPDC y huespedes extranjeros.
					
					En la ocasion humo premiacion.
					
					Fueron otorgados el premio colectivo al Conjunto de Musicas y Danzas Voronezh de Rusia, el Conjunto Estatal de Danza STAVROPOL COSSACKS de Rusia, la Banda Flamenco de Espana, el conjunto artistico de coreanos residentes en Japon y el conjunto artistico de coreanos residentes en China, y el premio de merito, el de creacion, el individual y el de ensamblaje a muchos artistas y piezas.
					
					Tambien fueron conferidos la copa de oro, los premios de oro y plata y los diplomas.
					
					En la ocasion fue aprobada la carta de los participantes al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Pak Chun Nam, ministro de Cultura y presidente del comite organizador del festival, pronuncio el discurso de clausura.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, se ofrecio la funcion de los artistas extranjeros quienes en la presente cita dejaron profunda impresion a los espectadores.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de participantes en XXX Festival Artistico de Amistad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de participantes en XXX Festival Artistico de Amistad
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio el dia 17 una carta que le enviaran los participantes en el XXX Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera. 
					La misiva senala que el presente certamen hizo un gran aporte a fomentar los lazos entre los pueblos y artistas de varios paises del mundo y volvio a manifestar  orgullosamente su excelente tradicion, noble ideal y gran vitalidad. 
					
					Continua que en los dias del festival los participantes celebraron mas significativamente junto con el pueblo coreano el Dia del Sol, natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, y observaron con sus propios ojos el aspecto admirable de la lucha heroica del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Expresa con satisfaccion que gracias a los esfuerzos sinceros de los coreanos y del comite organizador del festival, el presente certamen se realizo con exito. 
					
					Envia el agradecimiento a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un quien aunque estaba muy ocupado por la direccion sobre la construccion de un Estado prospero, presto atencion minuciosa a la marcha exitosa del festival. 
					
					Enfatiza que gracias a Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il estaran vivos para siempre en el corazon de la humanidad progresista del mundo y el Festival Artistico de Amistad Abril en Primavera se desarrollara como gran festival artistico internacional.

articles.title: IAPIC revela verdad de sofisteria anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y satelites
articles.content:
IAPIC revela verdad de sofisteria anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y satelites
Pyongyang, 17 de abril (ACNC) -- El Instituto de Asuntos Politicos Internacionales de Corea (IAPIC) hizo publica el dia 17 un acta de acusacion que revela los verdaderos aspectos de las calumnias y sofisterias de Estados Unidos y sus satelites contra Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					EE.UU. y sus seguidores hablan tan ruidosamente de la "provocacion" y "amenaza" de la RPDC, lo cual es una sofisteria cinica y bandolera que convierte lo negro en lo blanco, critica el documento y continua:
					
					Este proceder parte del temor extremo a la RPDC que se hace cada dia mas fuerte y persigue el objetivo asqueroso de asfixiarla y sepultarla movilizando hasta las gentuzas de toda indole. 
					
					La "violacion de la ley internacional y de la resolucion de la ONU" de la RPDC, de que hablan tanto EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles, no pasa de ser una provocacion infundada e injusta de quienes no saben nada del fundamento, ni la esencia del orden politico internacional.
					
					Eso no pasa de ser una terquedad perversa y abierto chantaje a la RPDC que no obedece al despotismo y arbitrariedades de si mismos ni al orden centrado en EE.UU. 
					
					Los Estados criminales mas anormales y malos en este mundo son EE.UU. y sus seguidores que convierten el globo terraqueo en el planeta donde reina la ley de la selva sin tener en consideracion los derechos y convenios internacionales por la igualdad y la paz. 
					
					El rumor de "inestabilidad del regimen norcoreano", que EE.UU. y sus lacayos difunden como hecho consumado en varias oportunidades, es una tonteria de quienes se ilusionan como realidad su sueno en espera ansiosa del "derrumbe del regimen" de la RPDC en varios decenios. 
					
					Como ya reconocen los compatriotas y los extranjeros, la RPDC no sufrio ni un pequeno titubeo politico, inestabilidad social, caos ni tumulto aun en medio de las severas pruebas y dificultades y pasando numerosos periodos mas penosos que la guerra.
					
					  Al contrario, en el corrupto sistema politico capitalista ocurren incesantemente la lucha antigubernamental y la resistencia popular de grandes y pequenos tamanos y toda la sociedad va sacudiendose y derribandose debido a la irreparable confusion y crisis.
					
					  Los disparates de EE.UU. y la banda de Park Geun-hye contra nuestra linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares no pasan de ser los alaridos agonizantes de los enajenados por el desarrollo deslumbrante y la victoria final de la RPDC.
					
					  Si ellos desean cuestionar tanto la realidad de la RPDC, no les retendremos sino les aconsejamos hablar solo de lo que hayan presenciado con sus ojos.
					
					  La puerta de Pyongyang esta abierta de par en par e indulgentemente a quienes criticaron a la RPDC habitualmente o siguiendo a ciegas a alguien en el pasado. 
					
					  A pesar de tal magnanimidad y paciencia, si uno que sea un individuo, una entidad o un Estado, sigue censurando nuestra idea y regimen sagrados y puros para lograr el mas sucio y vil objetivo y recurriendo a la demagogia anti-RPDC con la movilizacion de varias organizaciones internacionales y hasta los medios de agitacion venales, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea no lo toleraran nunca y le hara pagar sin falta el precio merecido.
